Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Br-AFP2 (natural AMPs; defensins; plants; XXQ, UCSS1a; 4S=S)
Sequence Information.Source: Brassica rapa subsp. chinensis; Brassica napus

Literature.Author: Terras FR, Torrekens S, Van Leuven F, Osborn RW, Vanderleyden J, Cammue BP, Broekaert WF.1993
Literature.Title: A new family of basic cysteine-rich plant antifungal proteins from Brassicaceae species

Sequence Information.Sequence uncertainty: Residue 10 is uncertain. Despite a W is placed there as other similar sequences, position 11 is not a standard amino acid
Sequence Information.Target Organism: low salt medium A: active against A. brassicola (IC50 75 ug/ml), B.cinerea (IC50 >100 ug/ml), F. culmorum (IC50 38 ug/ml), F. oxysporum f.sp. lycopersici (IC50 42 ug/ml), P. oryzae (IC50 3 ug/ml), and V. dahliae (IC50 15 ug/ml). Activity and Seq updated 2/2023.
